description:
runtime: fix tv_sec handling for netbsd/386

On netbsd/386, tv_sec is a 64-bit integer for both timeval and timespec.
Fix the time handling code so that it works correctly.

runtime: fix tv_sec handling for netbsd/386

On netbsd/386, tv_sec is a 64-bit integer for both timeval and timespec.
Fix the time handling code so that it works correctly.
